description.en:
This volume contains 11 stories:  
  
1-2. *Immature Mama* 1 & 2. His mother looks so young and she dotes on her son. But when she gets drunk… (It continues in mouto de Ii no?)  
  
3-4. *Tomo 1 & 2.* All right, his sister makes him cross-dress and he's a wuss. But his sister and a classmate think he's so cute…  
  
5. *Kuchu-Kuchu Extras.* A simple and erotic plan to beat the heat.  
  
5-7 *Incontinence 1 & 2.* Tomotaka wants his sister so badly he'll do anything–including drugging her and tying her up…   
  
8. *Graduation.* In a grim tale of revenge and rape, Sugimoto is humilated by the boy she tormented for 3 years.  
  
9. *Honeymoon In The Bed.* Mutsumi and her brother are attracted to each other. They agree to sleep together in the nude…  
  
10. *Honeymoon In The Room.* Mitsumi and her brother happily explore their love for each other. When their mother goes shopping, Mitsumi surprises her brother by wearing bloomers.  
  
11. *Honeymoon In The House.* Mitsumi and her brother are thrilled when their mother is gone for the weekend. They're alone together at last…
